companies.name: Google1
companies.description: 1Google is a global technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware. Google's mission is to organize the world’s information and make it universally accessible and useful.

companies.name: Amazon
companies.description: Amazon is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. Amazon is known for its disruption of well-established industries through technological innovation and mass scale.

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.description: Microsoft is an American multinational technology company with headquarters in Redmond, Washington. It develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Its best-known software products are the Microsoft Windows line of operating systems, Microsoft Office suite, and Internet Explorer and Edge web browsers.

companies.name: Facebook
companies.description: Facebook is an American online social media and social networking service owned by Meta Platforms. Founded by Mark Zuckerberg, it is one of the world's most valuable companies. Facebook provides a way for people to keep up with friends and family, discover what's going on in the world, and share and express what matters to them.

companies.name: Apple
companies.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California. Apple designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories, and sells a variety of related services. Apple's best-known products include the iPhone, iPad, and Mac.

companies.name: Netflix
companies.description: Netflix, Inc. is an American subscription streaming service and production company. Netflix offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. Netflix is known for its groundbreaking original content.

companies.name: Samsung
companies.description: Samsung is a South Korean multinational conglomerate headquartered in Samsung Town, Seoul. Samsung's diverse product portfolio includes smartphones, tablets, televisions, home appliances, semiconductors, and memory products. Samsung is a leader in the global electronics market.

companies.name: Oracle
companies.description: Oracle Corporation is an American multinational computer technology corporation headquartered in Austin, Texas. Oracle specializes in developing and marketing database software and technology, cloud-engineered systems, and enterprise software products—particularly its own brands of database management systems.

companies.name: Cisco
companies.description: Cisco Systems, Inc. is an American multinational technology conglomerate headquartered in San Jose, California. Cisco develops, manufactures, and sells networking hardware, telecommunications equipment, and other high-technology services and products. Cisco is a leader in the global networking market.
